name: Dragon Ball Z: Harukanaru Densetsu
description:
A card battle RPG featuring all your favorite Dragon Ball Z characters.
Cards are marked with eight types of actions, eight power levels and
eight guard levels for a total of 512 possible combinations that will
determine progress. From a randomly-dealt set of five cards, players
must choose which cards to use based on the eight types of action each
card offers. Multiple cards can be played together to power up attacks
and enhance guard levels for super combos. The intensity of Special
Attacks will increase as the game progresses, giving players all of the
power of the DBZ universe!

Features

• Cards are marked with eight types of actions, eight power levels and
eight guard levels for a total of 512 possible combinations that will
determine progress
• The intensity of special attacks will increase
as the game progresses
• Multiple cards can be played together to
power up attacks and enhance guard levels for super combos
• While
the game will progress even if players do not choose the best cards,
strategic players will unlock more surprises and be more successful in
game
• The game also supports wireless battle for up to 4 players and
includes a game sharing mode
